message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your offer, the price I have in mind is closer to $130. It reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, I understand you're firm on the value of the product, but I'm still only willing to go up to $110.  This is a fair price, considering the product is worth $100 to me. Let's meet in the middle.
